phrases: That bastard!
Where the hell did he go?
If I go into the alley, I will only get cornered.
Guess I will head back out for now, and
What should I do?
I cannot because a commotion now and risk getting noticed by the perpetrator.
Hey, you...
Is someone chasing you, by any chance?
Uh...
If you are in trouble, I can help you!
Have we met somewhere before?
I think this is the first time.
But what about your pursuers?
If you do not get going, they are going to catch up to you.
Gotcha.
The thing is, I would like to avoid any trouble if I can.
Okay!
Then come on!
This way!
Hey, come back here!
Do not tell me this girl is...
a Strega?
Battle Song
Since we have come this far, I guess we should be in the clear for now.
Thanks.
I really owe you one.
So?
Why were they chasing you?
Did they rip you off?
Well, it is complicated.
I see.
Well, you do not have to tell me if you do not want to.
But if you are planning to head back, I would wait a little longer if I were you.
With Rotlicht being kind of on edge, and all.
It is?
Since there is a Festa underway right now...
The police have been cracking down way harder than usual.
So the mafia running Rotlicht are acting pretty paranoid.
I see...
If that is the case, maybe I should look elsewhere.
Thanks for everything!
I would like to thank you properly if I could,
but I just do not have the time right now.
It is all right, it is all right.
Do not worry about it...
Ayato Amagiri.
Look at those speedy reflexes!
No wonder you are a Phoenix Festa finalist.
But you know, I am a little devastated that you would be so wary of me.
How did you know my name?
Well, aside from the fact that you are already a celebrity...
I think you should work on your disguise more.
It is totally obvious that it is you.
Y-You think so?
But it is not like I helped you because you are famous.
But then why would you...
Who would not help someone in their time of need?
And besides, you did not strike me as a villain.
Sorry.
After you saved me...
You really are a nice guy, are not you?
Right, it is not like I
For crying out loud...
How about giving your pursuers a break?
So, was it you?
The bastard who is been looking for somebody?
My guys would be interested to hear about that.
You are coming with me now.
Well, whoops!
Who knew you would actually chase him all the way here?
What the hell?
There is a woman here, too!
Talk about happy accidents!
I mean, that really motivates me!
Feel free to resist to your heart's content.
Otherwise, it would be such a bore!
Hold up a second!
This girl has nothing to do with this!
You are probably wasting your breath.
I mean, he is the type who puts his own hobbies over his work.
Right?
Former Jie Long Seventh Institute Rank 7, Nguyen of the Twin Snakes?
So you know about me?
Well, how awesome is that?
I never thought that a Lindwurs Festa semifinalist would be reduced
to serving as a runner for the mafia!
Yeah...
That was a long time ago.
H-Hey!
Knock it off!
Outta my way!
Look out!
Is that the best you can do?
Not bad, little girl!
In that case, I am going to go for broke!
No...
I have had enough.
If you were still in your prime,
this would not have gone so smoothly.
All right...
By the way, are you looking for someone?
Well, that is what I heard that guy mention just now.
Well, yeah.
I just might be able to help you out with that...
What do you say?
Help me out?
You?
Yes.
But first...
Why do not we go somewhere else?
Okay, here we are!
Sorry to take up your time when you seem to be in a hurry.
No, I am the one who should be sorry for dragging you into this.
I see.
I think I might be starting to figure you out.
Figure me out?
Even when you are in trouble yourself,
you are a kind-hearted person who can be considerate to others.
But you also try to carry the load by yourself,
and you cannot bring yourself to rely on others.
But during your semifinal match yesterday,
you did lean on Riessfeld, did not you?
You two really looked like a team out there.
You are pretty perceptive, huh?
Well, yes.
All right, then, can you tell me what kind of person you are looking for?
Oh, but
Do not worry.
It is not like I am going to tag along.
The point is, you just need the location of this person you are looking for, right?
Do not tell me...
you are a Detection-type Strega?
I would not call myself that, but...
Well, I guess I can accomplish something similar enough.
Anyway, I need some information to be able to visualize her.
All right.
I am looking for a girl who is ten years old.
Her name is Flora.
She is not lost, is she?
No.
She is been captured by someone.
The perpetrator is...
I can guess, but I am not sure yet.
Okay, I can do without that, I think.
So what about this girl's looks and personality?
Um...
NAME NATIONALITY
DATE OF BIRTH: 5/10 AGE GENDER: FEMALE BLOOD TYPE
Let us see.
That is fine.
I think we are good now.
But there is just one thing I want you to promise me first.
All right?
Promise you?
Do not ever tell anyone about what is about to happen now.
Keep it to yourself.
Gotcha.
I promise.
All right, I am going to get started, so open up a map.
The bigger the better, probably.
All right.
How is this?
You are...
Sylvia Lyyneheym!
Sylvia Lyyneheym...
Queenvail Girls Academy's Rank 1.
A Songstress and a Strega...
Using song as her medium,
she can transform her own image in all kinds of ways.
Her power is...
omnipotence.
Hmm, hmm...
Looks like it is the northern corner just outside Rotlicht.
You are saying Flora's there?
Yes, if I had more time to narrow it down, I could have given you a better idea.
No, no, this is more than enough!
Really...
Thanks!
I am happy I was able to help!
All right, I will be on my way now, or my manager will give me an earful!
Hey, hold up a second!
If you do not mind, could you give me your number?
I like it!
I do not think anyone's hit on me so blatantly in a long time!
N-No, I was not hitting on you or anything!
I wanted to thank you properly, Ms. Lyyneheym.
You can call me Sylvie!
That is my private address,
so contact me anytime.
O-Okay.
To be honest, I have been a little intrigued by you for a while.
Talking to you in person today, that intrigue is stronger now.
All right, good luck to you, Ayato.
In my own humble way,
I will be praying for little Flora's safe return.
It is great that you got a lead on Flora's whereabouts.
But how did you narrow it down to this spot?
Uh... well, you see...
Sorry, I cannot say.
Well, whatever.
All right, let us head over there right now!
Both you and Ayato should stay away.
You have got the final.
The final starts at noon.
That gives us some time, does not it?
No, this time around, Sasamiya's in the right.
It would be too reckless to go into the final like this.
You should rest as much as you can.
Ayato-senpai, Julis, we will be fine!
We are going to rescue Flora no matter what!
Fine.
Then let us focus all our energy on the final.
Right.
We will go rescue Flora, and you two will avenge us.
All's well that ends well.
They are counting on us, as well, are not they?
Though it is a bit too much.
No problem.
If we can rescue Flora, you will be able to use the Ser=Versta.
Well, as long as you get it done in time, that is.
Do you have to be such a buzzkill, Yabuki?
- Just sayin', just sayin'... - I am going to kick your butt.
Number 7, what is the situation?
All clear.
And your side?
Compliant, at least outwardly.
Shadow Star does not seem to be on the move, either.
But,
there was a totally suspicious-looking punk digging around the joint.
Well, as you know, the people who run the Rotlicht all hate my guts.
So I am not sure how solid that intel is.
What if someone crashes the party?
Play the hostage card.
I do not give a damn if it is an expendable one.
Understood.
What is wrong?
Apparently the party-crashers have just arrived.
This building used to be a fairly well-known casino,
but recently one of its customers went berserk
and totally trashed the place, I hear.
Th-That sounds scary.
Well, it is not uncommon, you know.
But I hear they have stopped construction for the last few days.
Stopped it?
Th-Then it is like a vacant house right now?
Pretty sketchy, huh?
All right, why do not we go inside and check it out?
B-But how are we going to do that?
Hey, hey, just leave it to me.
Keep an eye out for me, will you?
All right!
Okay, now we are in business!
All right, why do not we...
Hey, come on!
This is not anything hard core!
I just used some tools I picked up online,
and I have only ever tried it out a few times.
That was too easy for you.
Now, now...
Come on, let us get going!
The place seems to be deserted, huh?
Upstairs or downstairs?
Either way, I think we should all stick together.
I heartily second that motion.
Since I am not a good brawler.
This is the part where you say, I am a man, leave it to me.
But there is such a thing as right man, right job!
Besides, I have done my due diligence.
Due diligence?
Since I will not be of any use myself,
all I have to do is call on someone who will be, right?
What the hell's that?!
Is that...
Is that a human?
There is all this Mana concentrated around there.
It is probably Setting Magic.
Either way, looks like we are in the right place!
What the hell?
That was not much of a spell.
I will bet even I can handle...
How many do you think there are?
Do not ask me.
Hey, this must be autonomous-type power, right?
These guys can only execute simple commands for the most part!
They must have been ordered to get rid of any intruders!
I see.
Then there is no reason for us to deal with them.
Kirin!
Sorry!
Can you cover me for a second?
Roger that!
My legs...
39-type Lux Ray Gun, Wolfdora...
Burst.
Strafe.
Are you all right, Saya?
No problem.
I probably only have two or three more shots left, huh?
Hey!
I think it is too soon to relax!
What?
Not again!
Th-This could be endless!
Kirin, I know it is a little reckless, but we are going to charge in.
Yes...
I think that is our only choice.
Jeez!
What the hell do you think you are doing?!
Just the man I have been waiting for!
MacPhail-senpai!
Why are you here?
Damned Yabuki forced me to come!
Hey, now.
What do you mean by forced?
All I did was ask you for a favor!
Blackmailing as a negotiating tactic!
Is that how you ask for favors?!
Threatening is more like it!
Okay, MacPhail, take care of the rest, okay?
Hey!
W-We are so sorry!
We are counting on you to take care of this!
H-Hey!
Well, then, best of luck, man!
H-Hold up, you guys!
So Kirin... upstairs or downstairs?
Which do you think, Saya?
Down.
Me, too.
I heard what is going down.
But even still...
Why should I have to take on a role like this?!
COUNTDOWN TO THE FINAL
It is almost time, huh?
Is it?
We never did hear from Saya and Kirin, did we?
Julis...
Do not give me that look, Ayato.
Come on, let us go.
Hey, Ayato...
It is nice to have friends you can trust, is not it?
The thing about me, Ayato...
Flora...
Everyone back home...
They mean everything to me.
That is why I swore I would do anything for them,
and I always thought they were all I would ever need.
But now that I think of it,
by doing that, I was only closing off the world.
Ayato...
Because I have you as my, uh...
my partner...
that really hit home.
Julis...
I know I am not done making more friends I can cherish.
Like Saya and Kirin, you know?
Right now, I can believe in them whole-heartedly.
So do not worry.
I will be fine!
I see...
That is good, then.
All right, emerging from the east gate
is Seidoukan Academy's Amagiri/Riessfeld team!
And from the west gate, Arlequint Academy's AR-D/RM-C team!
We have seen all kinds of battles over the last two weeks,
and now the Phoenix Festa is down to its last battle!
This is the final match!
Oh, wow, I cannot wait!
It really is mystifying.
Despite our situation...
Right now, I want to win this match so badly, I can hardly stand it!
Yeah, same here.
All right, then,
let us go for it all, you and I!
Why do not we take everything we have ever wanted?
Without missing a single one, right?
So we meet at last, Ayato Amagiri!
I have been looking forward to this day!
As I am always hearing about you from my master,
I expect great things of you!
Please trigger more exhilaration in me than Kirin Toudou did!
Unfortunately, I cannot guarantee that I will.
But this match...
Victory will be ours!
No matter what!
These surging emotions...
I cannot hold them back!
Ayato Amagiri!
I have waited so long to battle you
Be silent, you good-for-nothing.
Episode 20 The Phoenix Showdown
There is not sufficient time during this preview to waste on useless prattle.
